original_text: That thou wilt do us no hurt, as we have not touched thee, and as we have done unto thee nothing but good, and have sent thee away in peace: thou art now the blessed of the Lord.
korean_text: 너는 우리를 해하지 말라 이는 우리가 너를 범하지 아니하고 선한 일만 네게 행하여 네가 평안히 가게 하였음이니라 이제 너는 여호와께 복을 받은 자니라

sentences.original_text: That thou wilt do us no hurt
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 우리에게 해를 입히지 않을 것이라

sentences.original_text: as we have not touched thee
and as we have done unto thee nothing but good
and have sent thee away in peace
thou art now the blessed of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 이제 여호와의 축복을 받은 자이니라
